name: Disappearing Islands
description:
Disappearing Islands is a very simple, relaxing, infinite platforming game. 

Each platform will spawn in a random location within a radius of the platform you are currently standing on. 

However, be careful, as each platform won't stick around forever!

Disappearing Islands is my first completed personal project within Unity without having followed any tutorials. I know it is very basic, but I wanted to challenge myself to complete a mini game and have it uploaded on Itch! I plan on adding more features to Disappearing Islands as I continue my game development journey!

Thank you for taking the time to have a look!

Sounds effects courtesy of https://www.zapsplat.com/
